charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1)- FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM

charges.charge_disposition: a total term of imprisonment of 180 months, this sentence consists of terms of 60 months as to each of Counts 1 and 5, to be served concurrently; and a term of 120 months as to Count 2, to be served consecutively to the terms imposed on Counts 1 and 5; a term of supervised release of 4 years, this term consists of 4 years as to each of Counts 1 and 2, and a term of 3 years as to Count 5, all such terms to run concurrently; a special assessment fee of $300.00

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) - POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: a total term of imprisonment of 195 months, this sentence consists of a term of 75 months as to Count 1 of case number 3:04-CR-150-001, and terms of 75 months as to each of Counts 1, 3 and 4 of case number 3:04-CR-166-002, all to be served concurrently; and a term of 120 months as to Count 2 of case number 3:04-CR-166-002, to be served consecutively to all other terms for a total effective sentence of 195 months; a term of supervised release of 4 years, this term consists of terms of 4 years as to Counts 1 and 2 of case number 3:04-CR-166-002, and terms of 3 years as to Count 1 of case number 3:04-CR-150-001 and Counts 3 and 4 of case number 3:04-CR-166-002, all such terms to run concurrently; a special assessment fee of $500.00. ---term of imprisonment is REDUCED pursuant to [50]; the defendants sentence as to Count One (case no. 3:04-cr-150) and Counts One, Three and Four (case no. 3:04-cr-166) is reduced to 60 months, plus the 120-month sentence for Count Two (case no. 3:04-cr- 166), for a total sentence of 180 months---
